event.title: is derived from the Northampton Patent of 1741

data.event: The town is derived from the Northampton Patent of 1741.

event.title: was formed from part of the northern part of the Town of Broadalbin in 1799

data.event: The town was formed from part of the northern part of the Town of Broadalbin in 1799.
In 1930, the Sacandaga Reservoir was created, submerging some of what was once dry land and swamp area beneath the surface of the lake.
